title: A defence of M. Perkins booke, called A reformed Catholike against the cauils of a popish writer, one D.B.P. or W.B. in his deformed Reformation. By Antony Wotton.
author: Wotton, Anthony, 1561?-1626.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Cuthbert Burby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Swan,
notes: A reprinting of and reply to "A reformation of a Catholike deformed: by M. W. Perkins" by William Bishop. Also reprints Perkins's work.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
